author: seamonkey82
content: Can we expect the information on https://launchpad.ethereum.org/en/withdrawals will be updated and tooling for partial withdrawals will be accessible from that page as soon as Pectra launches?

author: seamonkey82
content: Also, will an additional main header page be added for 'Consolidate'?

author: seamonkey82
content: Something I think might be worth considering would be to have a 'Validator Tools' heading with submenu items for Deposit, Top Up, Withdraw, and Consolidate.
